thread.title: Genalyte brings in $44mm via Series C
thread.title_full: Genalyte brings in $44mm via Series C

title: Genalyte brings in $44mm via Series C
text:
Genalyte brings in $44mm via Series C Deal Date: Aug-01-2015 / Deal # 201530637 Executive Summary 
Genalyte Inc. (blood-based diagnostics and microchip technology) raised $44mm in its Series C financing led by Khosla Ventures, which was joined by returning shareholders Redmile Group, Claremont Creek Ventures, and BioMed Realty Ventures. Proceeds will help improve its Maverick detection system for the physician's office, and to conduct clinical trials needed to develop the product for use in a near-patient setting.
